subject: Stadiums and Arenas
lead_paragraph: Allianz, a German-based company which had ties to Hitler’s Third Reich before and during World War II, has dropped out of negotiations to acquire the naming rights of the new Giants Stadium.
snippet: Allianz, a German-based company which had ties to Hitler’s Third Reich before and during World War II, has dropped out of negotiations to acquire the naming rights of the new Giants Stadium.
